item.title: Tainter's Collapse and the Henry Adams Curve
item.description: We’re on the verge of 2022. We just lived through the plot of Contagion, and social collapse is in, so it seems as good a time as any to think about the dynamics of it. ⊕ Image: https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=1129552 Complexity, from hand axes to Twitch streamers Back in 1988, Joseph Tainter published The Collapse of Complex Societies, an insightful look at historical cases of sudden, dramatic reductions in social complexity throughout history.
